resources.string:
"1. Stand with feet a little wider than hip-width, toes slightly pointing out.
" + "2. Reach your arms forward to help you balance.
" + "3. Bend your knees and push your hips back like you're sitting down in a chair.
" + "4. Keep your chest up and look forward.
" + "5. Go down until your thighs are parallel to the floor, or as low as you can comfortably go.
" + "6. Push through your heels to stand back up."
